name: The Monster Within (itch) (dhunHERO)
description:
You're watching TV, and there's a sudden monster plague outside. Your rebellious self decides to go out instead of staying in, so you grab your flashlight and head out.

Explore the environment and avoid the monsters. Meet a lab assistant and help her solve the plague. Read the sheets scattered across the world and discover who started the plague.

Another game by dhunHERO made for a school project.
